The claim was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been shared approximately 420 times.
The claim suggests that eating alkaline: fruits with pH levels above the virus can help prevent or cure COVID-19.
The claim provides a list of specific al: fruits, including lemon, lime, avocado, garlic, mango, tangerine, pineapple, dandelion, and orange, along with their corresponding pH levels.
Health experts: including Professor Dr Lee Yeong Yeh, state that there is no evidence to support the claim that eating alkaline foods can prevent or cure COVID-19. They emphasize that cellular pH is highly regulated and that viruses like SARS-CoV-2 rely on cellular pH to reproduce.
